snippet.title: War Mechanic Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Welcome to War Mechanic - a unique first-person simulator set in a dieselpunk world where World War II never ended. Manage a military base, explore with your combat vehicle, and survive in a world driven by war and money.

Add to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2861090/War_Mechanic
Discord - https://discord.gg/ByqnPE7bwZ
